skills.title: Front End
skills.description: Proficient with Responsive Web Design and Latest Front End Technologies, extensive experiences with AngularJS, Bootstrap, JQuery, HTML, CSS, and Material Design, rich experiences with Frontend Development Build Flow tool Gulp, familiar with package management tool like Npm and Bower, hands on experience with Front End Architecture Design and Refactoring

skills.title: Back End
skills.description: Proficient with Microservices and Modularizing Application Development, hands on experiences with API programming and API Specification, familiar with Java, JEE, Spring, Spring Data, Hibernate, Maven, JDBC, experienced in both Business Functionalities Development and Fundational Components Development

skills.title: Databases
skills.description: Extensive experiences with MySQL and MongoDB, proficient with Database Administration Tools like MySQL Workbench and Robomongo, familiar with Oracle 10g Database and Elastic Search

skills.title: Web Services
skills.description: Proficient with RESTful Web Services and WebSockets, hands on experiences with Tomcat Deployment and Docker Image Build, familiar with JAX-RS, Jersey, OpenFire, XMPP, HTTP, Tomcat, Node Server

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: Experienced with DevOps PipeLine, hands on experience with Jenkins, Docker, Chef Infrastructure setup, rich experience with Enterprise Linux Environment
